DOC.brief_summary: The Zilver速 PTX速 V Clinical Study is a post-market clinical trial required by the US FDA to provide continued evaluation of the safety and effectiveness of the Zilver PTX Drug-Eluting Peripheral Stent in treatment of narrowing of the femoropopliteal arteries.
DOC.brief_title: Zilver速 PTX速 V Clinical Study
DOC.criteria: Patient has signed and dated the informed consent. Patient has symptomatic vascular disease of the native abovetheknee femoropopliteal arteries. Patient agrees to return for the required followup assessments. Patient is < 18 years of age. Patient has significant stenosis of inflow tract not successfully treated before this procedure. Patient lacks at least one patent vessel of runoff with < 50% stenosis throughout its course.
